#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{     int ar[510],rem;
      int x,count=0,i;
      cin>>x;
      if(x==0)
      {  cout<<"1"<<endl; }
      else if(x==1)
      {  cout<<"0"<<endl; }
      else
      {  if(x%2==0)
         {  rem=x/2;
            for(i=0;i<rem;i++)
            { ar[i]=8; 
              count=count+2;
            }
            for(i=rem-1;i>=0;i--)
            {  cout<<ar[i];    }  
            cout<<endl;
         }   
         else
         {  rem=x/2;
            for(i=0;i<rem;i++)
            { ar[i]=8; 
              count=count+2;
            }  
            ar[i]=4;
            for(i=rem;i>=0;i--)
            {  cout<<ar[i];    }
            cout<<endl;
         }
      }
      return 0;
}
